description:
Aiden's girlfriend e-mailed his pictures to us. Her note said:
"My boyfriend is really hot and doesn't have a problem getting naked. I love your site and would love to see him on it." And she was right — her boyfriend is hot!
We had him out for a few days and he was a lot fun! Aiden had never done any modeling before, but for a first timer he was a natural. He has an infectious smile and warm personality and a dick that just won't quit.
I think the fact that he knew his girlfriend was going to be watching his video really turned him on...
title: Aiden
